org.archive.io.warc

类 WARCWriterTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.archive.util.TmpDirTestCase
          • org.archive.io.warc.WARCWriterTest
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    junit.framework.Test, ArchiveFileConstants, WARCConstants

    public class WARCWriterTest
extends TmpDirTestCase
implements WARCConstants
    Test Writer and Reader.
